Description détaillée
Html Class Inpired from Html/FormHelper for several functions
Documentation des fonctions membres
activateUserTemplateAutocompletion() activateUserTemplateAutocompletionHtml HtmlactivateUserTemplateAutocompletion
static activateUserTemplateAutocompletion (string $selector, array $values)[static]
Activate autocompletion for user templates in rich text editor.
Paramètres
string$editor_id
Renvoie
void
Depuis
10.0.0
Voici le graphe d'appel pour cette fonction :
addConfirmationOnAction() addConfirmationOnActionHtml HtmladdConfirmationOnAction
static addConfirmationOnAction ( $string, $additionalactions = '' )[static]
Add confirmation on button or link before action
Paramètres
$string
string to display or array of string for using multilines
$additionalactions
string additional actions to do on success confirmation (default '')
Renvoie
string
Voici le graphe d'appel pour cette fonction :
addTemplateDocumentationLinkJS() addTemplateDocumentationLinkJSHtml HtmladdTemplateDocumentationLinkJS
static addTemplateDocumentationLinkJS (string $selector, string $preset_target)[static]
Insert an html link to the twig template variables documentation page and move it before the given textarea. Useful if you don't have access to the form where you want to put this link at
Paramètres
string$selector
JQuery selector to find the target textarea
string$preset_traget
Preset of parameters for which to show documentation (key)
Voici le graphe d'appel pour cette fonction :
ajaxFooter() ajaxFooterHtml HtmlajaxFooter
static ajaxFooter ( )[static]
Display Ajax Footer for debug
ajaxForm() ajaxFormHtml HtmlajaxForm
static ajaxForm ( $selector, $success = "console.log(html);" , $error = "console.error(html)" , $complete = '' )[static]
This function provides a mecanism to send html form by ajax
Paramètres
string$selector
selector of a HTML form
string$success
jacascript code of the success callback
string$error
jacascript code of the error callback
string$complete
jacascript code of the complete callback
Voir également
https://api.jquery.com/jQuery.ajax/
Depuis
9.1
Voici le graphe d'appel pour cette fonction :
autocompletionTextField() autocompletionTextFieldHtml HtmlautocompletionTextField
static autocompletionTextField (CommonDBTM $item, $field, $options = [] )[static]
Show div with auto completion
Paramètres
CommonDBTM$item
item object used for create dropdown
string$field
field to search for autocompletion
array$options
array of possible options:
name : string / name of the select (default is field parameter)
value : integer / preselected value (default value of the item object)
size : integer / size of the text field
entity : integer / restrict to a defined entity (default entity of the object if define) set to -1 not to take into account
user : integer / restrict to a defined user (default -1 : no restriction)
option : string / options to add to text field
display : boolean / if false get string
type : string / html5 field type (number, date, text, ...) defaults to 'text'
required: boolean / whether the field is required
rand : integer / pre-exsting random value
attrs : array of attributes to add (['name' => 'value']
Renvoie
void|string
Voici le graphe d'appel pour cette fonction :

clean() cleanHtml Htmlclean
static clean ( $value, $striptags = true , $keep_bad = 2 )[static]
Clean display value deleting html tags
Paramètres
string$value
string value
boolean$striptags
strip all html tags
integer$keep_bad
1 : neutralize tag anb content, 2 : remove tag and neutralize content

string

getCriterionForMassiveCheckboxes() getCriterionForMassiveCheckboxesHtml HtmlgetCriterionForMassiveCheckboxes
static getCriterionForMassiveCheckboxes (array $options)[static]
Get the jquery criterion for massive checkbox update We can filter checkboxes by a container or by a tag. We can also select checkboxes that have a given tag and that are contained inside a container
Depuis
0.85
Paramètres
array$options
array of parameters:
tag_for_massive tag of the checkboxes to update
container_id if of the container of the checkboxes
Renvoie
string the javascript code for jquery criterion or empty string if it is not a massive update checkbox
getGenericDateTimeSearchItems() getGenericDateTimeSearchItemsHtml HtmlgetGenericDateTimeSearchItems
static getGenericDateTimeSearchItems ( $options)[static]
Get items to display for showGenericDateTimeSearch
Depuis
0.83
Paramètres
array$options
array of possible options:
with_time display with time selection ? (default false)
with_future display with future date selection ? (default false)
with_days display specific days selection TODAY, BEGINMONTH, LASTMONDAY... ? (default true)
Renvoie
array of posible values
Voir également
self::showGenericDateTimeSearch()
getInvertedColor() getInvertedColorHtml HtmlgetInvertedColor
static getInvertedColor ( $hexcolor = "" , $bw = true , $sbw = true )[static]
Invert the input color (usefull for label bg on top of a background) inpiration: https://github.com/onury/invert-color
Depuis
9.3
Paramètres
string$hexcolor
the color, you can pass hex color (prefixed or not by #) You can also pass a short css color (ex FFF)
boolean$bw
default true, should we invert the color or return black/white function of the input color
boolean$sb
default true, should we soft the black/white to a dark/light grey
Renvoie
string the inverted color prefixed by #

getSimpleForm() getSimpleFormHtml HtmlgetSimpleForm
static getSimpleForm ( $action, $btname, $btlabel, array $fields = [] , $btimage = '' , $btoption = '' , $confirm = '' )[static]
create a minimal form for simple action
Paramètres
$action
String URL to call on submit
$btname
String button name (maybe if name <> value)
$btlabel
String button label
$fields
Array field name => field value
$btimage
String button image uri (optional) (default '') If image name starts with "fa-", il will be turned into a font awesome element rather than an image.
$btoption
String optional button option (default '')
$confirm
String optional confirm message (default '')
Depuis
0.84
TODO : trouble : urlencode not available for array / do not pass array fields...
glpi_flush() glpi_flushHtml Htmlglpi_flush
static glpi_flush ( )[static]
Flushes the system write buffers of PHP and whatever backend PHP is using (CGI, a web server, etc). This attempts to push current output all the way to the browser with a few caveats. Voir également
https://www.sitepoint.com/php-streaming-output-buffering-explained/

jsAlertCallback() jsAlertCallbackHtml HtmljsAlertCallback
static jsAlertCallback ( $msg, $title, $okCallback = null )[static]
Summary of jsAlertCallback Is a replacement for Javascript native alert function Beware that native alert is synchronous by nature (will block browser waiting an answer from user, but that this is emulating the alert behaviour by using a callback function when user presses 'Ok' button.
Depuis
9.1
Paramètres
$msg
string message to be shown
$title
string title for dialog box
$okCallback
string function that will be called when 'Ok' is pressed (default null)
jsConfirmCallback() jsConfirmCallbackHtml HtmljsConfirmCallback
static jsConfirmCallback ( $msg, $title, $yesCallback = null , $noCallback = null )[static]
Summary of confirmCallback Is a replacement for Javascript native confirm function Beware that native confirm is synchronous by nature (will block browser waiting an answer from user, but that this is emulating the confirm behaviour by using callbacks functions when user presses 'Yes' or 'No' buttons.
Depuis
9.1
Paramètres
$msg
string message to be shown
$title
string title for dialog box
$yesCallback
string function that will be called when 'Yes' is pressed (default null)
$noCallback
string function that will be called when 'No' is pressed (default null)

progress() progressHtml Htmlprogress
static progress ( $max, $value, $params = [] )[static]
Creates an accessible, stylable progress bar control. Depuis
9.5.0
Paramètres
int$max
The maximum value of the progress bar.
int$value
The current value of the progress bar.
array$params
Array of options:
rand: Random int for the progress id. Default is a new random int.
tooltip: Text to show in the tooltip. Default is nothing.
append_percent_tt: If true, the percent will be appended to the tooltip. In this case, it will also be automatically updated. Default is true.
text: Text to show in the progress bar. Default is nothing.
append_percent_text: If true, the percent will be appended to the text. In this case, it will also be automatically updated. Default is false.
Renvoie
string The progress bar HTML

redefineConfirm() redefineConfirmHtml HtmlredefineConfirm
static redefineConfirm ( )[static]
In this function, we redefine 'window.confirm' javascript function by a prettier dialog. This dialog is normally asynchronous and can't return a boolean like naive window.confirm. We manage this behavior with a global variable 'confirmed' who watchs the acceptation of dialog. In this case, we trigger a new click on element to return the value (and without display dialog)
Depuis
9.1

showCheckboxMatrix() showCheckboxMatrixHtml HtmlshowCheckboxMatrix
static showCheckboxMatrix (array $columns, array $rows, array $options = [] )[static]
Display choice matrix
Depuis
0.85
Paramètres
$columns
array of column field name => column label
$rows
array of field name => array( 'label' the label of the row 'columns' an array of specific information regaring current row and given column indexed by column field_name
a string if only have to display a string
an array('value' => ???, 'readonly' => ???) that is used to Dropdown::showYesNo()
$options
array possible: 'title' of the matrix 'first_cell' the content of the upper-left cell 'row_check_all' set to true to display a checkbox to check all elements of the row 'col_check_all' set to true to display a checkbox to check all elements of the col 'rand' random number to use for ids
Renvoie
integer random value used to generate the ids

textarea() textareaHtml Htmltextarea
static textarea ( $options = [] )[static]
Display an html textarea with extended options
Depuis
9.2
Paramètres
array$options
with these keys:
name (string): corresponding html attribute
filecontainer (string): dom id for the upload filelist
rand (string): random param to avoid overriding between textareas
editor_id (string): id attribute for the textarea
value (string): value attribute for the textarea
enable_richtext (bool): enable tinymce for this textarea
enable_images (bool): enable image pasting in tinymce (default: true)
enable_fileupload (bool): enable the inline fileupload system
display (bool): display or return the generated html
cols (int): textarea cols attribute (witdh)
rows (int): textarea rows attribute (height)
required (bool): textarea is mandatory
uploads (array): uploads to recover from a prevous submit
Renvoie
mixed the html if display paremeter is false or true
